verses.verse: I will <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon my <S%H4931>watch<s%>, and <S%H3320>set<s%> me upon the <S%H4692>tower<s%>, and will <S%H6822>watch<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> what he will <S%H1696>say<s%> unto me, and what I shall <S%H7725>answer<s%> when I am <S%H8433>reproved<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> me, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3789>Write<s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%>, and make it <S%H874>plain<s%> upon <S%H3871>tables<s%>, that he may <S%H7323>run<s%> that <S%H7121>readeth<s%> it.

For the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is yet for an appointed <S%H4150>time<s%>, but at the <S%H7093>end<s%> it shall <S%H6315>speak<s%>, and not <S%H3576>lie<s%>: though it <S%H4102>tarry<s%>, <S%H2442>wait<s%> for it; because it will <S%H935>surely<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, it will not <S%H309>tarry<s%>.
Behold, his <S%H5315>soul<s%> which is lifted <S%H6075>up<s%> is not <S%H3474>upright<s%> in him: but the <S%H6662>just<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> by his <S%H530>faith<s%>.

¶ Yea also, because he <S%H898>transgresseth<s%> by <S%H3196>wine<s%>, he is a <S%H3093>proud<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%>, neither keepeth at <S%H5115>home<s%>, who <S%H7337>enlargeth<s%> his <S%H5315>desire<s%> as <S%H7585>hell<s%>, and is as <S%H4194>death<s%>, and cannot be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>, but <S%H622>gathereth<s%> unto him all <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H6908>heapeth<s%> unto him all <S%H5971>people<s%>:

Shall not all these take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> against him, and a <S%H4426>taunting<s%> <S%H2420>proverb<s%> against him, and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him that <S%H7235>increaseth<s%> that which is not his! how long? and to him that <S%H3513>ladeth<s%> himself with thick <S%H5671>clay<s%>!

Shall they not rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> that shall <S%H5391>bite<s%> thee, and <S%H3364>awake<s%> that shall <S%H2111>vex<s%> thee, and thou shalt be for <S%H4933>booties<s%> unto them?

Because thou hast <S%H7997>spoiled<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>, all the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H7997>spoil<s%> thee; because of <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, of the <S%H7151>city<s%>, and of all that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

¶ <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him that <S%H1214>coveteth<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1215>covetousness<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>, that he may <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H7064>nest<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>, that he may be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from the <S%H3709>power<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>!

Thou hast <S%H3289>consulted<s%> <S%H1322>shame<s%> to thy <S%H1004>house<s%> by cutting <S%H7096>off<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, and hast <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
For the <S%H68>stone<s%> shall cry <S%H2199>out<s%> of the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and the beam <S%H3714>out<s%> of the <S%H6086>timber<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> it.
¶ <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him that <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> a <S%H5892>town<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H3559>stablisheth<s%> a <S%H7151>city<s%> by <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>!

Behold, is it not of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3021>labour<s%> in the <S%H1767>very<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>, and the <S%H3816>people<s%> shall <S%H3286>weary<s%> themselves for <S%H1767>very<s%> <S%H7385>vanity<s%>?

For the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

¶ <S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto him that giveth his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%>, that <S%H5596>puttest<s%> thy <S%H2573>bottle<s%> to him, and makest him <S%H7937>drunken<s%> also, that thou mayest <S%H5027>look<s%> on their <S%H4589>nakedness<s%>!

Thou art <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H7036>shame<s%> for <S%H3519>glory<s%>: <S%H8354>drink<s%> thou also, and let thy foreskin be <S%H6188>uncovered<s%>: the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall be <S%H5437>turned<s%> unto thee, and shameful <S%H7022>spewing<s%> shall be on thy <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

For the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> thee, and the <S%H7701>spoil<s%> of <S%H929>beasts<s%>, which made them <S%H2865>afraid<s%>, because of <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, of the <S%H7151>city<s%>, and of all that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

¶ What <S%H3276>profiteth<s%> the graven <S%H6459>image<s%> that the <S%H3335>maker<s%> thereof hath <S%H6458>graven<s%> it; the molten <S%H4541>image<s%>, and a <S%H3384>teacher<s%> of <S%H8267>lies<s%>, that the <S%H3335>maker<s%> of his <S%H3336>work<s%> <S%H982>trusteth<s%> therein, to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H457>idols<s%>?

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto him that <S%H559>saith<s%> to the <S%H6086>wood<s%>, <S%H6974>Awake<s%>; to the <S%H1748>dumb<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>, <S%H5782>Arise<s%>, it shall <S%H3384>teach<s%>! Behold, it is <S%H8610>laid<s%> over with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and there is no <S%H7307>breath<s%> at all in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of it.
But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>: let all the <S%H776>earth<s%> keep <S%H2013>silence<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
